title: William Howard Taft National Historic Site: Operating Hours & Seasons
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Operating Hours & Seasons              Operating Hours & Seasons         NPS Photo  William Howard Taft Education Center & House   The site is open seven days a week from 8:00 am. to 4:15 p.m. Closed January 1,Thanksgiving Day, and December 25.  Guided Tours of the Taft House are every thirty minutes. The last guided tour of the day is at 3:45 p.m.  William Howard Taft National Historic Site is located at 2038 Auburn Avenue, one block south of Christ Hospital. Free parking is available in a small lot in front of the Taft Education Center or a lot on Southern Avenue.  For information on accessibility, visit the Accessibility page or Contact Us.  Visit the Directions page for guided directions and maps as well as other useful information about your visit or, you can call the park at 513-684-3262.
